stepOne.title: Step 1: What type of document do you need?
stepOne.description: Select a category and then a specific document template.
stepOne.categoryDescription: First, select a category that best describes your need.
stepOne.selectDocDescription: Now, choose a specific document from this category.

stepTwo.title: Step 2: Tell us about your document
stepTwo.description: Answer a few questions to customize your document.

stepThree.title: Step 3: Review & Download
stepThree.description: Your document is ready. Preview and download it below.

wizard.incompleteFieldsNotice: Please complete all required fields before proceeding.

documentPreview.notAvailable: Preview not available for this document.

disclaimerStep.description: Please read and agree to the following before proceeding.
disclaimerStep.disclaimerText1: 123LegalDoc provides AI-powered legal document generation for informational purposes only.
disclaimerStep.disclaimerText2: We are not a law firm and do not provide legal advice. Our services and generated documents are not a substitute for consultation with a qualified attorney.
disclaimerStep.disclaimerText3: You are responsible for ensuring the accuracy and suitability of any document for your specific needs and jurisdiction.
disclaimerStep.disclaimerText4: By continuing, you acknowledge you have read and agree to our full
disclaimerStep.agreeCheckboxLabel: I understand and agree to the terms.

pdfPreview.descriptionSign: Your document is ready. You can sign it digitally below or download it.
pdfPreview.browserNotSupported: Your browser does not support embedding PDFs.
pdfPreview.noDocumentDataDescriptionSign: Cannot sign: No document data available.
pdfPreview.noDocumentDataDescriptionLoad: Cannot load preview: No document data available.
pdfPreview.signingSuccessDescription: Your document has been successfully signed digitally.
pdfPreview.signingErrorDescription: An unexpected error occurred while trying to sign the document.

shareDownloadStep.description: Your signed document is ready. Download it or share it securely.
shareDownloadStep.disabledDescription: Please sign your document to enable download and share options.
shareDownloadStep.actionsPlaceholder: Sign your document to activate download and share.

questionnaire.description: Confirm a document type in Step 1 to see the relevant questions here.
questionnaire.noQuestionsNeeded: No specific questions are needed for this document based on the information provided{{stateInfo}}.

dynamicForm.description: Please answer the questions below to generate your document.
dynamicForm.answerDescription: Please answer the questions below. Your progress is saved automatically.
dynamicForm.reviewDescription: Please review your answers carefully before proceeding.
dynamicForm.noQuestionsNeeded: No specific questions are needed to generate the {{documentType}}. You can proceed.
dynamicForm.proceedMessage: You can proceed to the next step.
dynamicForm.errorMissingRequired: Please fill in all required fields.

docTypeSelector.title: Which document do you need?
docTypeSelector.subtitle: Select a category, then a specific document.
docTypeSelector.noResults: No documents match your criteria in this category.

authModal.errorMissingFieldsDesc: Please enter both email and password.
authModal.fullSitePrompt: For full account management or if you have issues:
authModal.goToFullSignIn: Go to Full Sign In Page
authModal.errorPasswordMismatchDesc: Passwords do not match. Please try again.
authModal.promptSignUp: Don't have an account? Create one
authModal.promptSignIn: Already have an account? Sign In

featureComingSoonDescDocs: Accessing your saved 123LegalDoc documents will be available shortly.
